question: What is the subject of the best-known works of writers Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon?
vanilla_rag_result: The best-known works of Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon focus on Roman history. Mommsen's monumental work is titled "A History of Rome," while Gibbon is renowned for his "History of the Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire." Both works provide significant historical accounts of different aspects of Roman civilization.
